title: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
creator_credit: Patricia Norris, Andrew Dominik, Dede Gardner, Jules Daly, Ridley Scott, Brad Pitt, David Valdes, Warner Bros. Pictures, Jesse Films Inc., Alberta Film Entertainment, Scott Free Productions, Virtual Studios and Plan B Entertainment
headline_credit: Canada, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2007
brief_description: Outlaw Jesse James is rumored to be the ‘fastest gun in the West’. An eager recruit into James’ notorious gang, Robert Ford eventually grows jealous of the famed outlaw and, when Robert and his brother sense an opportunity to kill James, their murderous action elevates their target to near mythical status.

constellations_other.name: Eric Bana
constellations_other.description: There must be something that draws Australian creatives like Eric Bana to darker material as they shoot to stardom overseas. Australia's penal colony past perhaps?
